data.expected_result: The two push notifications should be merged/grouped together
data.short_description: If you force-close the app after receiving a push notification, receiving a second push notification from the same channel won't group it with the first one
data.steps_to_repro: - Minimize Discord without closing it - Get someone to mention you so you receive a push notification - Remove Discord from your Android recent tasks. This is to kill the process. - Get another push notification from the same channel
